data.text:
And soon after, the Pretty Grand Prix finals began on a beautiful 
day! The first event was a performance contest. The rivals that 
remained in the competition were very tough.

Well, if you're going to do it, you've got to do it right. 
That's what it means to be a pro.
data.name: Gold City

data.text: City-san!! You're so beautiful!!
data.name: Yukino Bijin

data.text:
Everyone got your disposable cameras ready!? 
Very good!! V for victory!!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
Maruzen-chan!! 
You're looking nice and sharp today!!
data.name: Cafe Owner

data.text:
Jeez, who nominated me… 
Regardless, if you're participating in a 
competition, the only choice is to win.
data.name: Air Groove

data.text: Groove-senpai, she has the presence of an empress…!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
As this is the performance event, Gold City is a bit of a threat 
since she's a model. However, after all of that training, Curren 
Chan won't lose to anyone!

It's Curren, back from her training trip! 
Everyone, you're going to see a completely new Curren today♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: *twirls*
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Curren Chan, you're so cute!!
data.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl

data.text:
Next was the race event. Just like the preliminary 
rounds, each contestant will be timed in a race. 
For Curren Chan this was her chance for revenge.

Yup, of course♪ 
After all, you put them on for me, Onee-san!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Yup, of course♪ 
After all, you put them on for me, Onee-san!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
But I'm against some amazing senpais… 
Not only that, people will be judging me even more 
harshly thanks to the preliminary rounds, won't they…?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
In that case, I just have to 
believe in my own way of life. And…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
If you call me cute, Onee-chan, 
I'm pretty sure I'll be able to do this.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
If you call me cute, Onee-chan, 
I'm pretty sure I'll be able to do this.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
I could barely hear you! 
But… thank you.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Hehe, well I'm off!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Yup… All good♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
The only way to shorten my time is… 
to give it all I've got and push through the finish line!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Her starting form was fine. Now show 
me how you live and breathe on the turf.
data.name: Serious Horsegirl

data.text:
I really hope her horseshoe 
doesn't come off this time!
data.name: Race-loving Horsegirl

data.text:
Hehe, I can hear you all. 
Don't worry, you'll all fall 
in love with me soon enough.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Because…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: "You're cute…"
It's the first time she's said that to me!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
And because of that, today I'm… 
the best in the academy, the best in Japan, 
the best in the world,
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: The cute Curren Chan!!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
She's finished! Curren Chan has 
set the fastest time here in the finals!!
data.name: Competition Staff

data.text: Hey, you were watching me, right…?
data.name: Curren Chan

choices.text: You were so cool out there!
You were so cool out there!

data.text:
Eh? That's what you wanted to say!? 
How weird… ahaha!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Well, whatever! The next event 
is a speech competition, right? 
I'll be sure to steal everyone's hearts away♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
The final event, the speech competition, is going to be held 
immediately after the races. Since I'm her trainer, I tried to 
think of some advice to give her.

Curren Chan is the embodiment of people's dreams, the 
embodiment of what it means to be cute, so of course 
she's charming, but… the embodiment of what it means 
to be cute, so of course she's charming, but…

choices.text:
You should show them 
more of the real you.
choices.processed:
<size=37>You should show them 
more of the real you.</size>

choices.text:
You should show them 
more of the real you.
choices.processed:
<size=37>You should show them 
more of the real you.</size>

data.text:
Eh? But I was willing to let 
you monopolize that, Onee-chan♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Eh? But I was willing to let 
you monopolize that, Onee-chan♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
But if you really want me to, I guess I can show a little bit of 
it! Make sure to keep your eyes and ears focused on me though♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
But if you really want me to, I guess I can show a little bit of 
it! Make sure to keep your eyes and ears focused on me though♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Curren's speech is next…! I'm so excited! 
I wonder what she's going to talk about.
data.name: Stylish Horsegirl

data.text:
She did amazingly in the race, but it could have just been a 
fluke. I wonder if she'll be able to show whether she's actually 
got substance to back herself up.
data.name: Serious Horsegirl

data.text:
Once the murmuring in the room 
had died down Curren Chan began to speak.

Everyone, there's something I want to tell 
you all today. You see, my dream is to…
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Become the pinnacle of cuteness!!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: blank

Cuteness, is something everyone has somewhere in their hearts! 
Cuteness, is a miracle that can make anyone happy!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Cuteness, is the dream we chase for eternity! 
Cuteness, is the love that I 
send each and every one of you!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
So that everyone's lives can be filled 
with a little bit of cuteness. 
That's the whole reason that I am here!!
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Wh-Why is my heart beating so intensely…!? 
This is…! The power of… of…
data.name: Serious Horsegirl

data.text: Curren Chan's cuteness!!
data.name: Serious Horsegirl

data.text:
That speech of a mere three minutes was historic 
and legendary. The Pretty Grand Prix concluded 
with Curren Chan being crowned the victor.

After the Grand Prix had finished, Curren Chan was waiting for me 
on the rooftop. That reminds me, there's something that's been 
bothering me for some time now… That reminds me, there's 
something that's been bothering me for some time now…

choices.text:
Why did you pick me 
to be your trainer?
choices.processed:
<size=40>Why did you pick me 
to be your trainer?</size>

choices.text:
Why did you pick me 
to be your trainer?
choices.processed:
<size=40>Why did you pick me 
to be your trainer?</size>

data.text:
Do you really want to know? Well you see… 
I figured you'd do anything I said♪
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Ehehe. But that's not the only reason. 
I guess you don't remember. 
We met once before, a long time ago.
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
My dream is to… 
become the cutest girl in the universe!
data.name: buttonfix

data.text:
When I said that, you didn't laugh at me, Onee-chan. You smiled 
at me and said that it was a "very lovely dream."
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
When I said that, you didn't laugh at me, Onee-chan. You smiled 
at me and said that it was a "very lovely dream."
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Ah, so that girl at the amusement park was her. 
As I was reminiscing about that time, 
Curren Chan came close to me and asked…
Hey, Onee-chan. How cute do you think I am?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: Hey, Onee-chan. How cute do you think I am?
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: I already knew what answer she wanted!

choices.text: The cutest girl in the universe!

data.text: Hmm? All of a sudden there was a flash…

Hehe, I just took an amazing selfie of us♪ 
I'll upload this to Umasta♪
data.name: Curren Chan

choices.text: Ah! When did you grab your…

data.text:
#WithMyTrainer 
#I'llBeRelyingOnYou #CuteCurrenChan
data.name: Curren Chan

data.text:
Curren Chan's road to domination has only just begun. 
And as such, I must stand by her side and 
continue to support her until she achieves her dream…!
